meanings.definition: The quality or state of being corny or overly sentimental.
meanings.sent1: The hokiness of the movie made it hard to take seriously.
meanings.sent2: The hokiness of the love scene made everyone cringe.
meanings.sent3: The hokiness of the birthday card brought a smile to everyone's face.
meanings.sent4: The hokiness of the play was like a thick fog that enveloped the audience.
meanings.sent5: The hokiness of the song lingered in the air long after it ended.

meanings.definition: Something that is contrived or artificial in nature.
meanings.sent1: The hokiness of the painting was evident in its exaggerated colors.
meanings.sent2: The hokiness of the speech made it hard to believe the sincerity behind it.
meanings.sent3: The hokiness of the magician's act was part of its charm.
meanings.sent4: The hokiness of the excuse was like a poorly crafted disguise.
meanings.sent5: The hokiness of the sculpture made it stand out among the more realistic pieces.
